response.overview: Join us on a Motorcycle Journey with Colton Udall, Rory Sullivan, Kyle Redmond, and Colton Haaker, as we explore the types of terrain that define today's off-road racer.  Visually stunning and equally entertaining, RedTide Pictures brings you the best, explaining what they do the best: Ride.  Technical endurocross, deep sand, high speed desert, and deep wooded trails: no problem.  This is not your father's instructional,  Heck, it's not even your older brother's. We have redefined the term through new age cinema technology that truly displays the dynamic form of each individual's unique skill set.
response.tagline: Join us on a Motorcycle Journey with Colton Udall, Rory Sullivan, Kyle Redmond, and Colton Haaker, as we explore the types of terrain that define today's off-road racer. RedTidePictures brings you the best, explaining what they do the best: Ride.
response.title: Offroad Essentials
